amendment.description: To provide for the recovery and availability to the Corporation for the Promotion of Rifle Practice and Firearms Safety of certain firearms, ammunition, and parts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4303 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4303 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6388) To provide for the recovery and availability to the Corporation for the Promotion of Rifle Practice and Firearms Safety of certain firearms, ammunition, and parts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4303 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4303 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
